myThings.subject: Travel
myThings.description: I like to travel as much as I can. Over December and January I was in Japan seeing some of the sites. Most recently I was in S. Korea for a few days spending some time with a friend that was over there.

myThings.subject: Gaming
myThings.description: I enjoy playing RPGs and JRPGS in my free time. At the moment I all of my free time is going to Persona 5.
